meanings.sent1: She spoke obnoxiously loud during the movie.
meanings.sent2: He played his music obnoxiously in the library.
meanings.sent3: The parrot obnoxiously mimicked the sound of the alarm clock.
meanings.sent4: The car alarm blared obnoxiously in the quiet neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The toddler laughed obnoxiously at the silly clown.

meanings.sent1: The dog barked obnoxiously at the mailman every morning.
meanings.sent2: She obnoxiously interrupted the teacher during the lesson.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel obnoxiously stole all the birdseed from the feeder.
meanings.sent4: The old clock chimed obnoxiously every hour.
meanings.sent5: The phone rang obnoxiously during the important meeting.
